diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $HGF$ is $2x$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BCA$ is $80$ degrees.
The line $HF$ is perpendicular to the line $AF$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is equal to the measure of angle $GHF$.
line_instances: There are lines $GH$, $HF$, $GF$ forming a triangle $GHF$.
There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
